participant_1.background:
I am new to my job, but I have been fascinated by ghosts since graduating from Princeton.
i can do convincing bird calls.
i graduated college for secondary english education.
my favorite activity is fishing.
i live with my husband and two children.

participant_2.background:
I spend my days designing and sewing my own clothes.
my only friend is a dog.
I got fired from my job for speaking my mind too much.
i hate to workout , but i need to.
I find that reading about the history of the world and its philosophy helps me put my own troubles into perspective.

content.text: Hi there! I am new to the area, what's your name?
Hello! I'm participant_2. Nice to meet you. What brought you to our city?
I moved here for a job. I just graduated from college and got hired as an English teacher.
Oh how exciting! What are you most excited about with your new job?
I'm most excited to get to know my students and help them learn. I also love the idea of living in a new city.
That's so great! I'm sure you'll be a wonderful teacher. I'm pretty new to the city myself. I moved here a few months ago after getting fired from my old job.
Oh no! I'm so sorry to hear that. What happened?
I got fired for speaking my mind too much. My boss didn't like it when I disagreed with him.
That's really unfair. You shouldn't have been fired for that.
Thanks. I'm trying to look on the bright side. Now I have more time to focus on my design work.
That's great! What kind of design work do you do?
I design and sew my own clothes. I have a small business selling them online.
That's amazing! I would love to see your work sometime.
Sure! I'll send you a link to my website.
You're welcome. It was nice talking to you.
You too! Have a great day.
